DOC.brief_summary: This research project aim conduct three-arm multi-center randomize control trial ( RCT ) innovative telerehabilitation intervention patient chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) . The overall purpose RCT demonstrate whether long-term integrated telerehabilitation involve exercise training home , telemonitoring , education/self-management prevent hospital readmission , thus reduce healthcare cost , patient COPD , improve patient status quality life .
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Integrated Telerehabilitation COPD Patients . A Multi-Center Trial
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis COPD At least one COPDrelated hospitalization COPDrelated emergency department presentation previous 12 month enrollment Capable provide sign write informed consent Attendance rehabilitation program previous 6 month enrollment Participation another study may impact outcome study Deemed health care team physically uncapable perform study procedure Presence comorbidities wich might prevent patient safely undertake exercise program home Home environment suitable installation use rehabilitation monitoring equipment ( e.g . physical space , WiFI Internet mobile Internet via 4G )
